mapper.sql: MSG_FLOW, PLAN_FLOW, SPE_ID, SPE_NAME, CLASS_NUM, PEOPLE_NUM, ADRESS, PLAN_TARGET, REMARK, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from RES_QUALIFIED_PLAN_MSG
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into RES_QUALIFIED_PLAN_MSG (MSG_FLOW, PLAN_FLOW, SPE_ID, SPE_NAME, CLASS_NUM, PEOPLE_NUM, ADRESS, PLAN_TARGET, REMARK, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW) values (#{msgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peopleNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SPE_NAME = #{speName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
